conbody.p:
The ENM Application Launcher lists all the ENM applications you can access. To launch an application, click the application name. You can mark applications which you access and use regularly as a favourite by clicking the
icon.
To get more information on an application, hover over the application tile, and click the . A short description of the application is displayed.

Some applications are opened in a new tab. These application have the
icon displayed next to them. Click the icon open the application in a new tab.
Individual Help Applications offer comprehensive contextual online help content
